name: Stars
text: 0:0, Inspire 1.
catalogText:
Stars costs no mana and gives you no points, but on the next round
you will have 1 extra mana.

The line at the bottom describes what the Inspire keyword means.

It's best if you have a plan for how to spend that mana next round, otherwise it could go to waste.

name: Bone Knife
text: 0:0, your opponent discards their leftmost card.

name: Cog
text: 0:0, Build 1.

name: Crossed Bones
text: 1:2, Fleeting, create 2 ${50}s in your discard pile.
catalogText:
Stars costs no mana and gives you no points, but on the next round
you will have 1 extra mana.

The line at the bottom describes what the Inspire keyword means.

It's best if you have a plan for how to spend that mana next round, otherwise it could go to waste.

name: Dove
text: 1:1, Visible, Fleeting.

name: Drown
text: 1:1, discard the top 3 cards of your deck.

name: Dash
text: 2:3, Flare.

name: Swift
text: 2:2, Visible, +1 if the next card costs 1.

name: Gears
text: 2:0, Build 2.

name: Cosmos
text: 2:0, Inspire 1, Inspire 1 for each of your cards later in the story.

name: Factory
text: 3:0, Build 1 for each card later in the story.

name: Fruiting
text: 3:0, Nourish 3.

name: Gift
text: 3:3, both players draw 1.

name: Hurricane
text: 4:0, set both players points to 0.

name: Dinosaur Bones
text: 4:5, Fleeting, create 3 ${50}s in your discard pile.

name: Mine
text: 4:4, remove from the game the top 4 cards of your discard pile.

name: Chimney
text: 5:2, your opponent puts the leftmost card of their hand on top of their deck.

name: Tumulus
text: 5:4, +2 if your discard pile has at least 8 cards in it.

name: Uprising
text: 6:3, +1 for each card before this in the story.

name: Stalker
text:
6:4.
Costs X, where X is the number of cards in your opponent's hand.

name: Sarcophagus
text: 6:0, put the highest cost card from your discard pile on top of your deck. Gain points equal to that card's cost.

name: Anubis
text:
7:7.
Costs 0 if you have at least 12 cards in your discard pile.

name: AI
text:
8:4, draw 1.
Costs X less, where X is the total point value of all robots in your hand.

name: Oak
text:
8:8, if you win this round, convert to Nourish any excess points that you won by.
(For example, if you win 8 to 5 you get 2 points Nourish)
